page.title: 05The View from Class 5 Window
page.content: The general view from Class Five window consists of different buildings of various shapes and sizes.The land usage is more farmland than anything else.On a clear day you can see Lincoln Cathedral or even the power station on the River Trent.You can plainly see the A1 dual carriageway and the A52 running from Grantham to Nottingham.There are pylons obstructing the view,but they don't obstruct it too much.You can sometimes see the occasional train in the distance,but I don't see much outside the window because I'm usually concentrating on my work.The trees are quite interesting,oak is quite common. This beautiful countryside to me,has a kind of magic about it.I think we are very lucky to have such a view from our classroom.
